Class GameTurnDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameTurnDriver

  • public class GameTurnDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will phases and manages the turn.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    raghavsharda

    • Field Detail

      • phase

        private java.lang.String phase
        Stores the current phase name.

      • gameOver

        private boolean gameOver
        Shows if game is over

      • wonCard

        private boolean wonCard
        Variable stores the information if a player win a territory in attack phase. Value is true if player win atleast one territory and false if none.

      • driver

        private GameDriver driver
        Stores instance of GameDriver class.

        public boolean phaseCon

    • Method Detail

      • startFromReinforcement

        public void startFromReinforcement(Player currentPlayer)
        This method starts the turn from reinforcement phase
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - player having first turn

      • switchPhase

        public void switchPhase()
        Function to switch between different phases and notify observers. Also if a player win a territory during attack phase calls issueCard() method from GameDriver.
